content.detailedDescription:
First of all i want to start by saying i am not crazy, tonight at about 8pm my boyfriend and i were going to his house in saginaw county, mi and were going down a somewhat country road to get there, the road had houses on it but we were the only car on the road (usually theres at least one other car we pass on the way there). while on the road i saw a light in the sky that was far away that looked like a weird star or planet or something i noticed it because of its strange colors and after he saw it we started arguing about what it was, it wasn't moving but he said it was a plane and so i pulled over to prove it wasn't moving, it then started moving back and forth so we were both wrong and we saw a plane pass below it (it was definitely a plane). i started getting a bad feeling in my stomach, kind of like anxiety and said we should go so we continued driving down the road when (and this is the part where i swear i'm not crazy, we both saw exactly the same thing) three lights in a row came out of nowhere and started coming directly towards us. it was flying very low, too low to be a plane and almost in the tree line, at this point i was the most scared i have ever been in my life, it was not stopping and my boyfriend was telling me not to stop the car but i turned it around as fast as i could and started going as fast as i could the opposite way, i was telling him to call 911 and he got out my phone and had the number dialed but didn't call and i was so scared my whole body was shaking, we were about two miles from the main road. i was near tears when we got to the main road and once we got there he tried to say it could have been another plane, so i insisted we go to the airport, once there he went in and talked to a sheriff and airport worker who said that the only flight that came in was from chicago, this all happened before 8:30pm. we then concluded that there was no way it could have been a plane, (my boyfriend is very rational and level-headed) after the airport he told me that while we were driving, whatever had been in front of us was driving directly next to us less than a quarter mile away, he got a vague look at it and said it had no wings or tail, when i was driving i was going about 70mph and slowed to about 55mph when coming to a stop sign, he said it stayed directly next to us the entire time. this was the most terrifying experience i have ever had and i almost can't believe it happened.
     on a side note, earlier that evening i found out my blood type was b- and that if a woman gets pregnant and that baby has a + blood type the mom could reject it, so we had been talking about that and while looking ufo sightings today i stopped for a bit to get more info on my blod type and found a article saying that most people who are abducted by aliens have b- or other - blood types; not that i think i was abducted it was just a weird incident and that information made it a little weirder... it would be nice to get a bit more info on that.
content.summary: Red, amber, green/blue lights followed by 3 circular white lights, saginaw county, mi

content.detailedDescription: Husband was taking pictures of trees for trimming work needed and came running in the house and told me there is something in the sky. i was watching tv. he said it was moving. i ran to the window saw it and we both went on the balcony to watch it. we have both seen objects before this that were unusual and it was at night. this was the first time we saw something in the day. it was a bright shiny silver object in the sky - far in the distance.  my husband said that it was moving. it appeared to be going bright than i could barely see it and it continue like that the entire time. we both looked at it with our binaculars. it looked like there was a red light that was moving on it. it stayed stationary for a while and then it traveled in a easterly course. i took a few pictures and can see something in one - if you zoom in close you can see it. i watched it for about 20 minutes until it moved out of my sight.
content.summary: Husband saw object in sky and showed me - i saw it for about 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back seat of our car, coming from merrillville to michigan city indiana. it was about 6:45 pm and the stars were out. i was looking outside of the window and saw a couple of star-like lights that were moving and flashing. i saw three airplanes in the same air space in parallel lines. then i saw a very bright thing that looked like a star, at first i thought it was the north star, but it was three times the size of the other stars so i thought that it was a planet, then i realized the it was moving real slowly upwards. it seemed like it was getting closer. i looked at the other lights around it and saw three other starlike moving objects around it as well. then as the large starlike object came closer, i saw other lights on the object. the lights were red, green, blue, white, and yellow/orange in a triagular shape. as it got closer, i think i saw a triangular shape but i can't be sure. it definitely was not any aircraft that i know of, not an airplane or a helicopter or a jet. it also moved as if it were floating/hovering. after about 10 mins from seeing it, i lost sight of it. the drive from merrillville to michigan city took about 30 minutes and during that time i saw a lot of weird moving lights that looked like stars all of them changed and flashed colors atleast one point or another and they also moved in a way that planes cannot possibly move. all in all i believe i saw 8 unidentified flying objects and 6 planes.
content.summary: Multiple ufos and man-made aircrafts

content.detailedDescription:
Malibu ca. - my girlfriend and i were sitting out on our deck watching "lost" on my laptop when we spotted an extraordinarily bright object about 25 feet to our right slowly meandering down the road in a straight line, neither moving up or down, left or right. the object was about two stories off the ground (about 10 feet over our heads). it made no sound at all and seemed to be nothing more then a bright light. after about 15 seconds it emitted a orange flash from it's "back" side (the side opposite it's traveling direction) and took off in the same direction at incredibly fast speeds. unfortunately there were tree's obstructing our view so i had to jump up on the railing to try to get a better look but by then it was out of sight. due to the fact that it was so close to us, made no sound at all and had no visible physical shape we were both at a loss to explain the sighting other then as a ufo. if anyone else has seen this please post something about it because we are both very curious to get to the bottom of the sighting. thank you!

j.
content.summary: Bright silent orb traveling slowly then shooting off in an instant only 25 feet away from us

content.detailedDescription:
saturday afternoon i was outside doing some gardening when i looked up at the sky and noticed a dark triangle shaped object traveling low from the northeast towards the south.What ever it was it looked different than a buzzard or hawk in it's movement so i ran in the house to get my binoculars to get a better look. by the time i returned outside it was gone.
i sat down for a minute and looked through the binoculars again and saw a white circle shaped object that i first thought was the moon.Realizing the moon wasn't full i continues to watch the object as it was traveling west from the north east towards austin.It was perfectly round,white and pulsating.I watched this for a few seconds and then i wanted to see if i could view it w/out the binoculars-it was white and silver.It was moving much faster than a plane,satellite,or iss. since we live in a wooded area i lost sight of it after about 10 secs.Excited i ran around to the other side of the house but couldn't find the object.
 over the last couple of years my family has had a few sightings which we reported to mufon and investigator *(fi's name removed--cms/sg). one of our sightings was again a day time sighting(february 2010) that 5 of us witnessed 6 roundish silver disk shaped objects traveling exactly the same direction of what i saw the other day.That sighting lasted about 8 minutes!
content.summary: White pulsating orb traveling from east to west seen in the afternoon clear sky

content.detailedDescription: I live in manassas park, va and was witness to the large black triangle spotted over centreville but closer to the weekend of november 6th-7th. at first i simply dismissed it as a plane since i live close to dulles airport but after a minute of observing i realized it wasn't. i admit i'm not a very good judge of distance and size but i could tell after watching it was far too big and slow moving to be an aircraft. it had bright white lights in what would be the middle rear of the craft in the direction it was moving. it also had blue lights at each tip. the blue lights are what made me stop and think a second that running lights are red (port) and green (starboard).
content.summary: Large black triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south to pick my daughter up from work. it was a clear night and as i drove closer to the city area i saw a bright orange/yellow fireball type object "blink" for a few moments off to the left of me in the sky.  i was wishing someone was there to witness it with me for validation but at the same time was not surprised to see it, i felt it was driven by some intelligence by the way it was "flying" and by the "flash" it gave as if acknowledging my presence or my attention to it.
earlier the same night at approximately 8:00 pm i was driving home after dinner and saw a series of 3 lights in the northwestern sky blinking at different times flying in a trinangular formation. one would blink then the next then the next and so on,at first it looked like plane lights but i doubted it once i saw the "order" in the way they were blinking and the way they flew at equal distance to one another. i lost sight of the objects or object through the trees, and got a bit turned around in my neighborhood trying to follow the lights.
i wasnt amazed or blown away either time, i felt validated somehow as if expecting to see them.  hard to explain but i didnt react the way i thought i would....
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Large fireball orange/yellow in color traveling from the west to the east flashed very fast across the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Me and a friend were baking in my kitchen when we saw flashes in the sky from the kitchen window, facing my backyard.

we ran out onto my deck and recorded what we saw on my cell phone.  sadly, my cell doesn't have a hdr video recorder so what i caught was one of the dots doesn't quite do it justice. i suppose it's better than nothing.

the dots would spark up then vanish, they looked as if they were moving on the same parallel rail, back and forth. it went on for about 10 minutes but it was hard to catch them on film because they would fade in and out so fast.

i have a full 5 minute version which you can hardly see anything, but, about a minute in you can see one we were able to catch on camera.  i took the liberty of clipping the footage of just the ufo in case you didn't want to hear me and my friend banter about aliens for 5 minutes
content.summary: Moving dots witnessed in md sky daytime with video

content.detailedDescription:
I was about nine or ten yrs old, i remember it was in the early 70's probally 1971 0r 1972.  my dad sent my brother to the store and i went with him.  it was in memphis, tennessee, i dont recall what month it was, but i believe it was around summer time because had on a t shirt.  on the way back from the store, my brother screamed out, " look a ufo," while pointing out the window, towards me.  i just busted out laughing until i turned my head.  then i began to get scared and was saying go , go home. he said no, he wanted to watch it.  so as i sat there trembling and watching this ufo with amazement because of all the movement in the sky, it was zipping by doing all kinds of manuvers in every direction.  

i think we watched it for a few hours, i do know that when we returned home, that when we came in my dad said "where have you been?" i guess he thought we were out joy riding in the car.  we wasnt.  well when my brother told him what we saw, i was told to go to bed and thats all i remember..Execpt what the ufo looked like.  i made a pic the best i could to describe what we seen.  i guess you would say it was round with spikes pertruding out all over and at the end of the spikes were colored lights, it really was a beautiful thing to see, and i never seen a pic that anyone reported that looked like the one that we saw that night until today which is why i am writing.  i caught about five min. of a show with a man named chris bledsoe, i think in carolina.  i think he seen three of them and then they combined to make this spikeball like the one i seen. it is the closest thing to this day to match what my brother and i saw that night. i will submit a pic of what i saw.  i made this pic on 10/10/2010.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Spiked with lights

content.detailedDescription:
Just after sunset, sitting on the deck of a holiday house at lake bennett in australia's (vast and sparsely populated) northern territory. i was taking some photographs of my family relaxing - i did not use a flash because i wanted to get that grainy-dusky feel to my photos (i use a cheap little digital camera for happy-snaps, nothing fancy). as i lined up the photo and pressed the button i was momentarily blinded by light - i thought my flash had gone off by mistake although the light was brighter than the usual flash. i reviewed the photo and saw the bright light on the image. my daughter who was fishing said she hadn't noticed anything and neither did my husband, who was cooking at the time and there was no-one else around to ask. near this area however, is a place called acacia hills where there have apparently been many sightings of ufos over the years.

after seeing the image i immediately sensed that i had photographed something unusual and it could not have been an insect or dirt on my lens (none of the other pics taken at that sunset time had any unusual features).
content.summary: Bright light flashed in and out of view very fast

content.detailedDescription:
Not sure of exact year, not ever able to connect with anyone to discuss the event. it had to be late spring or early summer of 1962-64. i was quite young at the time. my parents home backed up to a heavily wooded area. at dawn i was awakened, and looked out of my rear window. at that moment i saw a disc shaped object hovering in our back yard. i noticed that it was directly over mom's laundry pole. this was about 35' from the back of the house. the object was about 40' in width, and about 15' high. it made no sound.Half of the object hovered over our back yard, the other in the woods. after i sighted the object, (lasting only a 
matter seconds), i have no memory of any event. only that very brief encounter. please, anyone who may have a connection, contact me. its like close encounters where no one believes you.
content.summary: Dark gray round silent object 30-40'  wide hovered within 35' of my location

content.detailedDescription:
At first, i was looking outside and i could see infrared red lights scanning from the above the sky and in every possible direction but mostly towards me. they seems to be very smart, tricky and agressive... they are an artificial intelligency scanning us and they play with your mind.

they target our electrical sources and use them to make noises and always mention...That they are getting closer to us... its a matter of time before they will control everything

look at the video first and you will understand, we are totally surrunded by those red x-rays light and i think people dont see them. there is a long story behind that and it must be revealed

by the way regarding the question how did you lose sight of the object,

i can see them always at night!!

of course there is much more than that...
content.summary: They seems to be using a light signal to travel and scanning in our eyes

content.detailedDescription: Went to have a smoke looked up saw three glowing cigar looking objects flying fast then stopped mid air turned right and flew off after complete stop hovered then turned direction whole object glowed bright white no blinking lights on it no sound air outside became warm for a split second when hovering directly above a jet flew in thier flight path all three stopped in mid air and turned right and flew off at crazy speed left a light streak in sky that stayed approximately one min after they disapeered sky went from cold to warm and smelled like someone lite a bunch of matches lasted a second or two, this  was seen in longview washington three other neighbors witnessed this event.
content.summary: Four cigar shapes glowing moving back forward stoppinh in mid air turning direction going oppisit way from a dead stop

content.detailedDescription: I was  on the way to take my son back home and was just takeing pics....Well something was telling me in my head to take picks of the sky y i dont know and i did whle on g.W.So on the 11\9\2010at 6 i was going threw mypicks on my phone & something was in the pick thats not soppose to be in the first pick its seems to be a cuple dots in the sky & the next one iz right above the g.W i dont kno wat it is can you tell me thanx ur aways k.M
content.summary: I couldnt beleve my eyes iz this really in my pick

content.detailedDescription: Was with a friend leaving my home to go grab a bite eat. when leaving my neighborhood i see across the tree line a bright white light that caught my eye. we both thought it might just be a tower. then after driving down the road a little we realized that this thing definitely was not a tower cause it was moving and this white bright light didn't look right. we then followed it down the road a little more and this thing got very close about a 1,000 to 1,500 feet in the air and came right above us. when we got a good look at this object it was a black triangle and very big not a small object at all. it then stopped the bright white light and changed to a bright red one at one of the three tips. there was 4 red circle lights underneath it blinking. we couldn't believe what we were seeing so we turned around and this object picked up speed and disappeared out of thin air and then came back and then disappeared again but never came back. i simple can't explain this whole thing that happened but it was insane can't believe i saw this object disappear in front of my eyes and then reaper. the only thing i can think of is this object had the power of invisibility which in logic doesn't exist. plus on top of this all i live down the road from a airport and i see planes and helicopters all the time. my uncle is even a pilot so i know what i'm talking about here and what we saw was no air craft i have ever seen. this object made no sound or anything just glided across the sky.
content.summary: Shadow shaped triangle bright white light, red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from work when in the middle of the sky in front of me i noticed there was a bright white light in the sky. as i headed south home, it remained stationary and i got closer and closer to it. for about ten minutes i watched the bright light hover in the same spot in the air. i thought maybe it was a planet until the bright light suddenly went out and was replaced by blue pulsating lights. about five to ten minutes later, the bright light came back and the blue pulsing faded. i then thought it could be a helicopter based upon its behavior; however, at one point at around 9:58pm i drove directly underneath of the object. i could see its shape perfectly. it was an obtuse triangle. the bright light i had seen on the front was actually a combination of three - one was on the tip and the other two were on either side of that bright central light. on the other tips, i could see blue lights. they did not look like aircraft lights, but instead looked like a slowly pulsating glow. i could not believe what i was seeing. i lost sight of it after i passed beneath it. i did not see it from that point forward.
content.summary: Three bright white lights on front, two pulsing blue lights on tips, obtuse triangle, stationary

content.detailedDescription: After visiting the grand canyon the day before, on april 18th on the way back to my son's home in denver my wife wanted to go thru the hopi reservation.  during the entire three day trip we would stop the car for me to get out and take pictures.  i took hundreds but none like the ones attached to this email.  i never saw the object and was not aware of the object in my picture until last week.  after i got home i downloaded the pictures of the trip onto my computer where they will cycle thru as the screensaver flashes them up on the screen.  it was one night when i had taken a break from my computer and the screen saver was cycling these particular pictures caught my eye.  i had never notice the bright light in the center before.  what you are seeing are two photos i took of the landscape one up close and the other a little further back.  my camera is a digital cannon with a 12x telescopic lens.  what caught my eye more than anything was the bright object had moved in relationship to the clouds.  the two pictures were taken within seconds of eachother.  in truth i have no idea what it is but several family and friends have told me to send it to you to see what you think.  if you notice there was no sun that afternoon it was getting ready to storm and did later on in the day.  the sky was black.  no one, not my son, wife or grandchildren nor i saw any object in the sky that day but it is clearly there in the picture.  i was outside the car heading north on the passenger side facing east when the pictures were taken.  the sun would have been behind me if it was out but it wasn't.  so i can tell you it was not a break in the clouds for the sun to poke thru nor is a reflection of any kind.  however, the light was bright enough to cause a light ring in the camera lens as you can see.  that ring is not on any other pictures ever taken with this camera.  the camera was not moving because the rest of the picture is clear and steady.  i do believe the slight light streak behind the object is the results of the object moving.
content.summary: Bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in  my yard laying back on a old sliding board, just relaxing in the nice weather,it was a clear blue sky and very little clouds if any,you had a clear view all around.I was just laying there looking up at the blue sky, when something just told me to look up,just then a jet was passing by we live in a very busy flight area, and i have seen all types of aircraft, all the time, day and night..Anyway all of a sudden i looked up and this thing was flying by moving really fast,i mean fast in a northwest,southeast direction,it was long like a tube silver, in color, or metal,shiny,but not alot. it was like it just popped in the sky,very high alitude,it had to be large it might had been one inch in length from that distance,a quarter inch wide.Even though it was moving fast,as it was flying over me i was able to make this detail out.I followed it till it suddenly gone, like it just popped out.Also while i was watching the object it looked llike it had long smaller tubes, one on each side.My daughter was out side with my granddaughter,when i yelled and said look at that! she was unable to see it because i had sunglases on at the time which it made it clear for me to se it,i told her what i saw and then it was all over,could`nt have lasted a minute and a half if that...Im a emt and a fire fighter, and do not just say things unless it is what it is.My first ufo sighting,i had to share it with everyone...I was unable to get any photos,or video,maybe if i had them both there beside me at the time,but it happened so fast.Thank you for all you do.
content.summary: Very fast craft - silver or metalic

content.detailedDescription: All this has been happening for the past month and a half...Since the day we first spotted them each day more and more have been showing up....My wife and i have been outside the house and at my daughters mother and step father house when all of this has been going on....What made us notice them was the fact that they had blue,red,green and white lights but not like plane lights..And at certain times the lights will go crazy and they objects will hover and stay up in the sky sometimes looking like they are not moving but then they will get closer....We have even spotted one fly over our house and the dogs around our house will go crazy as if they sense something.....When we first started seeing these object we knew that they wasn't commercial, or military planes and not satelite's...Two weeks ago we did a comparison and video taped these objects as well as a normal plane....But when we would zoom in the object looks like it was moving fast and the camera picture was steady...My wife is kinda scared yet a little excited about this finding...But i am also excited yet curious as if what are they planning or trying to find or observe...Every time we lose sight of these objects they either fly away fast or look like they totally disappeared...We have also noticed that more and more of these objects have been showing up kinda like tactically the other night we counted about 10 or 12...We plan on observing again tonight...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change

content.detailedDescription: It happened while i was standing in a large unplowed field in hillsboro, near highway 26.  i had my camera out; i was about to photograph a row of trees because i liked the way they looked, and this craft came over the trees and i snapped the photo. i lowered the camera and the craft had shot straight up and all i saw was a sort of metallic flare on its edge from the sun as it disappeared.  i didn't think i had the photo and i wasn't sure what i'd seen.  i was in the process of moving the next week so i didn't get the film processed (it was a traditional film camera). i would guess this thing was at least fifty feet wide because the trees were between forty to fifty feet tall. i have no idea how high this craft was, but it traveled very fast and then almost stopped before it took off.  i didn't see any windows or any sign of how it was propelled.  it made no sound whatsoever until it shot up, and i didn't hear anything but the traffic on the freeway.  there were no other witnesses as far as i know because the traffic was light and no one was in the field but me. it happened around the time of the hillsboro air show, probably after the show at least by a week, but there were planes flying all over just a few days earlier if i recall, and a lot of them were military planes.  i know that because they flew really low right over my apartment in hillsboro every day for at least a week.
content.summary: It came from the west over a row of trees near a residential area shot straight up.

content.detailedDescription: I walked outside the south exit of this building to see stationary light that resembled a helicopter search light. after staring at it for a few minutes, it dimmed and began to move slowly south and then faded out. no strobes or red/green lights to speak of sky was clear and other stars visible. i'm reporting in case someone else saw it in the area. also no sound.
content.summary: Light next to what i think was venus to the south by southeast that was brighter than venus.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were sitting in my car facing the west, about 5 miles from lake michigan when a bright light caught his eye just above the horizon, to the left of the setting sun. he noticed the object first, then nudged me. the light was far brighter and larger than a plane or helicopter. i saw the light flash for just a second or two, and then the light stopped, revealing a grayish blue (just a shade darker than the sky) disc-like object. the disc shape hovered for a few seconds before going down into a group of clouds, where it changed color to match the clouds. from there, it travelled in a downward diagonal direction. we decided to drive to the shore to get a better look, and in doing that we lost sight of the disc.
content.summary: Bright blinking light that went away to reveal the shape of a stereotypical flying saucer

content.detailedDescription: The date was 31 oct 2010 around 7:00 to 7:30 pm. the location was northridge, ca. the night sky was pretty clear, the wind pretty calm, temperature was mild 60���������s. i was in the backyard star watching which is pretty typical for my weekend evenings. our backyard is on a south facing hill overlooking the san fernando valley, is quite dark for the valley, and there are no homes behind us. from almost directly overhead a dark object caught my eye. as i focused it was a third round, or a rounded ���������boomerang��������� shape, of about seven or nine dark circles, i did not think to count them. it was pretty close overhead and moving slowly although it seemed to move past rather quickly. its motion was very ���������smooth��������� and it was absolutely quiet. it moved from northwest to southeast with the center circle in front and the others tailing out left and right. it appeared and ���������disappeared��������� quickly. not that it moved so far into the distance that i could no longer see it but that it just got so dark it sort of ���������disappeared��������� into the night sky. the entire time i actually saw it was maybe 10 ��������� 15 seconds. my first thought was ���������what the hell is that?��������� but logically i assumed it must have been a string of large black balloons let loose on halloween night, although there remained some small hint of my initial thought ���������what was that���������. then last night, 7 nov, i googled ���������why move to florida��������� (nothing related to that night), and eight or nine results down i saw ���������a florida parent and 18-year-old son report watching a large, fast-moving, boomerang-shaped object with no lights move directly overhead on november 3���������. i clicked on and read the article. i do not know what i saw that night, but the witness statements and description of what they saw could have been describing what i saw. attached is a representation i made of what i saw that night. the entire object appeared to be just the circles which were a dark ���������grey���������, or at least appeared to have no color or illumination that i could distinguish. again it moved slowly and smoothly, had no lights, and made not a sound.
content.summary: Rounded ï¿½boomerangï¿½ shape of about seven or nine dark circles, slow and absolutely silent

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a delivery to mana dr near the hospital. i was traveling down bob yunkin rd towards the south end of the hospital when i saw a white cylindrical object hovering about 60-100 feet over the hospital. at first i assumed that it was a helicopter or a plane but i decided to pull over to make sure. (when i pulled over i was just about on appleby rd.) i studied the object for about 2 min. the object was white and cylindrical, it had discoloration like an off grey on both ends and a redish looking stipe in the middle, there were no wings,rutters, windows, tail sections, outboard engines, or any visible exhaust, nor did it make any sound. having made the decision that i was not going to find out what this thing was i decided to go ahead and make my delivery. by the time i had reached mana dr i had spent about 45 seconds- 1 min traveling when i stopped at my destination i looked where it had previously been and it was gone. i had decided that i would never see it again when (on my way into the building) i caught a glimse of it to the east atleast 30 miles away and a mile higher than before. ps. the object was about 30ft long and about 8-10ft wide.
content.summary: White cigar shaped object hovered over the hospital for 3 min (to my knowledge)

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dogs at night.  i happened to look and something moving caught my eye.  it was distictively being thrust forward three times increasing speed before it disappeared.  

as soon as i saw it, i instictively knew what it was,.

i felt calm and piecefull. i tried to see it i would see another one or if it was coming back., but nothing.
content.summary: Flying away

content.detailedDescription:
hi, 

felt the need to at least contact someone from your group to give a heads up on an opportunity for interesting photos and or video on what seems to be very low flying craft (multiple). possibly square or triangle shaped. i have been traveling down back roads here in southern nj for several years on the weekends and have never seen as much activity as in the past couple of months let alone this very evening. tonight was slightly unnerving as they were the lowest flying i've ever seen. i was frustrated to not be able to see them as clearly as i was driving and didnt have to courage to pull over for what would have been my first real close up view. i hope there is an opportunity here. belguim quality. the area was a drive from marlton nj down to cumberland county most activity tonight was seen along malaga rd. lately this area seems to be a hot spot.I hope that someone from your group thats local takes the time to ride out a couple of nights to see whats really going on out there.
content.summary: Multiple objects low flying. multi colored lights. triangle or rectangular.

content.detailedDescription: It was early friday morning, i was talking with my friend on his back porch. i looked up and saw what looked like a very bright star, it was still then started moving to the east. it went a pretty long distance then did big a u-turn as it finished the turn it vanished not to be seen again. the sighting lasted for around 10-15 seconds. our reaction was like "what in the hell" we started laughing because it just blew our minds. how could something be still start moving at a high rate of speed do this huge turn then just vanish as soon as it finishes the turn.
content.summary: Sitting outside when it shot across the sky turned around then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were in my backyard on saturday november 6th 2010 at approximately 5:15 pm when i looked up and saw two oddly shaped objects in the sky about 600 - 700 feet above my house.At first i thought they were balloons, or kites, but they were not. my friend and i were baffled because there was a moment when they seemed to hover for a few seconds, then started to to move slowly from northeast to southwest at about approximately 40 mph. the breeze at the time was going from west to east so we knew they were not balloons. i ran as fast as i could inside to get my camera, and snapped 4 shots of them. the objects were black in color and had a semi-round appearance, until they would tilt sideways and were flat like a pancake. they continued southwest for approximately 10 miles, or until we could no longer see them. all the while they were tilting, or rotating.
content.summary: Standing with friend in backyard 2 ufo's flew over us. ran inside and snapped 4 photos.

content.detailedDescription: Well i was at my work in kennebunk maine and i was by myself and it was around 2 am in the morning. i went outside to throw away a bag of trash and as i put the bag of trash in the in the bin in the corner of my eye there was a bright light and i turned around there was this hovering object with a blinding light over the trees and without a sound. this encounter lasted around 4 to 7 seconds after on the object just beamed out of nowhere and was gone, this object literally time warped back to wherever it wanted to be.
content.summary: Bright light, no sound, hovering, didnt move, close to ground, right above trees,

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i had just left prescott adult library.  there is a large hill that overlooks the prescott sewage treatment plant, going east.  we had reached the top of that hill when a shiny object in the sky caught our attention.  immediately we recognized that it was not moving, except for an in place rotation.  there was no question that it was not conventional.  
the rotation was actually quite slow, with the suns reflection blinding us as the object rotated.  from the rotation, it appeared to us, to have presented its frontal part to us, dipped down at us.  then rotated the frontal part up and to the east.  rotating at a 60 to 70 degree angle up and to the east. the object then made a medium speed get away for about a half mile.  with two military jets closing in from the north and south, the object then disappeared in front of us.  there were no clouds in the sky to obstruct our view.
i could not reference a shape from my vantage point, however my husband described the shape as an outline of a triangle, only in that the outer 3 spokes would have formed that.  the spokes, he said stood out from the main part of the vessel.  the object once again....Standing still except for a slow rotation up and to the east.
i saw some sort of residual trail.  my husband did not recall any trail.  we both agree that there was no noise at all.
content.summary: No clouds/2 to 3 thousand feet/three pronged triangle, rotated in place/military jets closing in.
